precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Start with your right hand flat on the table.
Open up your fingers and your thumb.
Close your fingers and your thumb around the green cube.
Stack the green cube on top of the blue cube.
Cross your body with your right arm towards the orange cube.
Close your hand around the orange cube.
Stack the orange cube on top of the green cube.
Bring your hand back down onto the table to rest.
